title: Gamification-Based Instructional Design for Elementary English Numeracy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Providing personalized learning environments using individual mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately pronounce and spell English numbers from 1 to 100.
Learners can complete number-related quizzes in a gamification environment with an 80% or higher accuracy rate.
Learners can participate in motivation activities (challenge tasks, reward systems) based on the ARCS model at a rate of 90% or higher.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
